A: Places of things
B: 上	above, on, over
B: 下	under, below
B: 前	in front of
B: 後ろ	behind
B: 右	right of
B: 左	left of
B: 先	before
B: 横	next to
B: 隣り	next to
B: 側	next to
B: 中	inside
B: 辺	around here
B: 角	at the corner of
B: 隅	in the corner of
B: 奥	inside the building
B: 外	outside
B: 内	inside
B: 間	in between
B: 近く	close to, near to
